mapper.insert: insert into chas_yw_qwjl (id, isdel, data_flag, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, baqid, baqmc, bz, czmj_sfzh, czmj_xm, dwxtbh, czsj, wpbh, cyr, rybh, czlx, sswpxxid, lhwp, zbdw_bh ,wlhwp,cab_id,cab_bh) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{dataFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czmjSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czmjXm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwxtbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cyr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sswpxxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lhwp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zbdwBh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wlhwp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cabId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cabBh,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select id, isdel, data_flag, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, baqid, baqmc, bz, czmj_sfzh, czmj_xm, dwxtbh, czsj, wpbh, cyr, rybh, czlx, sswpxxid, lhwp, zbdw_bh, wlhwp,cab_id,cab_bh from chas_yw_qwjl
1=1 and isdel = 0
and baqid = '${baqid}'
and rybh = '${rybh}'
and sswpxxid = '${sswpxxid}'
and cab_id = '${cabId}'
and czlx = '${czlx}'

select jl.*,sb.sbmc from chas_yw_qwjl jl left join chas_xt_sb sb on jl.cab_id = sb.sbbh
1=1
and jl.baqid = '${baqid}'
and jl.rybh = '${rybh}'
and jl.sswpxxid = '${sswpxxid}'
and jl.cab_id = '${cabId}'
and jl.czlx = '${czlx}'
